attributes.value: Has a great deal of respect for the law
Values eloquence
Finds the idea of fair-dealing foolish and cheats when she finds it profitable
Sees no value in holding back complaints and concealing emotions
Finds introspection to be a waste of time
Prefers a noisy, bustling life to boring days without activity
Considers craftsmanship to be relatively worthless
Values martial prowess
Believes that the time taken to master a skill is a horrible waste
Greatly respects individuals that persevere through their trials and labors
Finds nature somewhat disturbing
Can easily fall in love or develop positive sentiments
Is quick to form negative views about things
Desires little for herself in the way of possessions
Is unfriendly and disagreeable
Is quite polite
Is very ambitious, always looking for a way to better her situation
Thinks she is fairly important in the grand scheme of things
Always acts with mercy and compassion at the forefront of her considerations
Tends to consider what others think of her
Lives at a slow-going and leisurely pace
Has an active imagination
Agile
Slow to heal
Good creativity
A sum of patience
A feel for music
A very bad sense of empathy
